segments.text: I'd like to purchase a parking permit for next semester .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you a daytime student or do you just come in the evenings ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you be driving a motorcycle or a car ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will be driving my car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , that will be twenty-five dollars . How would you like to pay for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll pay for it with a check .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to pay for any extra permits for another vehicle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you go then . Have a great school year !
segments.speaker: S2
